allnotifications.message: Now is a time to set up your weekly exercise goals. Let's make your goal a routine!
The best workout tips are setting a goal, being consistent, following your routine and tracking your progress! Do you want to share your workout tips to the Facebook page?
Learn some life-changing benefits of exercise!
Did you watch your exercise video and do some exercises last week? If not, think about why that was and when you will watch them for this week.
Did you know staying physically active improves your cognitive health, like helping you think, learn, and problem-solve? Don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions!
Find simple ways to make exercise fun and enjoyable! What about trying some new activities that keep you stay active?

Flexibility exercises can help increase range of movement, making everyday activities such as bathing, driving, and housework easier. Have you noticed any daily activities that have become easier for you to complete? Post your own experience to the Facebook group!
